answers.answer: LKM antibody is different than what you had.  About 30% of people with autoimmune hepatitis can have thyroid disease although very low titer autoantibody titers and even hypothyroidism can be sen with fatty liver.  the fact that things improved with your weight loss suggests the latter.  Keep up with your healthy living and i think you should be fine.  I hope your DM and high cholesterol will also imorove or resolve with your lifestyle changes.
